TEXT.TITLE: COMPAQ COMPUTER <CPQ> CUTS PORTABLE II PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Compaq Computer Corp said it has cut prices on its PORTABLE II models 2 and 4 to 2,699 dlrs from 2,999 dlrs and to 3,999 dlrs from 4,499 dlrs respectively. reuter
